Translations.Text: Mu sa que yi zhaoshi nimen xuduo mingzheng, ta likai nimen zhihou, nimen que ren du wei shen, nimen shi bu yi de.

Dangshi, wo yu nimen diyue, bing jiang shanyue shuli zai nimen de shangmian, wo shuo: Nimen dang jianshou wo suo ci nimen de jingdian, bing dang tingcong. Tamen shuo: Women ting er bu cong. Tamen bu xindao, gu dui du zhi ai, yi jinrunle tamen de xinling. Ni shuo: Ruguo nimen shi xinshi, namo, nimen de xinyang suo ming nimen de zhen elie!
Ni shuo: Ruguo zai zhenzhu nali de houshi de anzhai, shi nimen siyou de, taren bude gongxiang, namo, nimen ruoshi chengshi de, nimen jiu xiwang zaosi ba!
Tamen yinwei cengjing fanzui, suoyi jue bu xiwang zaosi. Zhenzhu dui yu bu yi de ren, shi quanzhi de.

Ni bi faxian tamen bi shiren hai tansheng, ci na yi wu pei zhu de hai tansheng; tamen zhong mei geren, dou yuan xiang shou qiansui, dan tamen zong xiang shang shou, zhong bumian yao shou xingfa. Zhenzhu shi mingcha tamen de xingwei de.
Ni shuo: Fan choushi ji bu li li de, dou shi yinwei ta feng zhenzhu de mingling ba qishi jiang zai ni de xin shang, yi zhengshi gu jing, yindao shiren, bing xiang xinshimen baoxi.
Fan choushi zhenzhu, zhong tianshen, zhong shizhe, yiji ji bu li li he mi ka li de, xuzhi zhenzhu shi choushi bu xindao de renmen de.
Wo que yi jiang shi ni xuduo mingxian de jixiang, zhiyou zuiren bu xin ta.
Tamen mei feng dijie yi xiang mengyue, bushi jiu you yibufen ren paoqi ta ma? Buran, tamen daban shi bu xindao de.

Dang yige shizhe neng zhengshi tamen suoyou de jingdian de, cong zhenzhu nali lailin tamen de shihou, xinfeng tian jing de ren zhong you yibufen ren, ba zhenzhu de jingdian paoqi zai tamen de beihou, hao xiang tamen bu zhidao yiyang.

Tamen zun sui zhong emo dui yu su lai man de guo quan suo xuandu de wumie yanlun ──su lai man meiyou pan dao, zhong emo que pan daole ──tamen jiao ren moshu, bing jiang babilun de liang ge tianshen ha lu te he ma lu te suode de moshu jiao ren. Tamen lia zai jiaoshou renhe ren zhiqian, bi shuo: Women zhishi shiyan, gu ni buke pan dao. Tamen jiu cong tamen lia xuele keyi lijian fuqi de moshu, dan bude zhenzhu de xuke, tamen jue buneng yong moshu shanghai renhe ren. Tamen xuele dui ziji youhai er wuyi de dongxi. Tamen que yi zhidao shei gou qu moshu, shei zai houshi jue wu fu fen. Tamen zhi yi ci chumai ziji, zhe daijia zhen elie! Jiaruo tamen zhidao,(bi bu ken xue).
Jiaruo tamen xindao, erqie jingwei, namo, cong zhenzhu nali jiangxia de baochou, bi shi geng hao de; jiaruo tamen zhidao,(bi yi xindao).
Xindao de renmen a! Nimen buyao (dui shizhe) shuo: La yi na, nimen yingdang shuo: Wen zhu er na, nimen yingdang tingcong. Bu xindao zhe, jiang shou tongku de xingfa.

Bu xindao zhe ──xinfeng tian jing de he yi wu pei zhu de ──dou bu yuan you renhe fuli cong nimen de zhu jiang yu nimen. Zhenzhu ba ta de ci'en zhuan ci gei tasuo yiyu de ren, zhenzhu shi you hong en de.
